sys_hub_flow.name: Close Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get the value of x_58872_needit_autoCloseOverdue application property to determine how old a task should be (in days) to automatically close it.
This action wil take the output from Get Property action (the number of days).
Find all NeedIt tasks that are overdue. Compare this (Calculated date < due date)

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs.label: Wait For Completion
